author: hroskes
body:
Trying to move towards a common interface for writing alignment datasets.  I start from the MillePede script and add functionality to write dataset files in the HipPy syntax as well.

I was holding off on making this PR because I wanted to replace Alignment/OfflineValidation/python/TkAlAllInOneTool/dataset.py with use of this script but didn't get a chance.  I don't want to wait any longer because of potential merge conflicts.

cc @connorpa @adewit @mmusich
title: Common tkal dataset writing script
